title: Jhin will suck botlane
body:
Not good at objectives by himself: Check (Bonus points since riot told us that explicitly)
Mediocre waveclear: Check. Again, riot brought up that he's going to get shoved in-lane. W might be able to clear later on in the game.

Unless his bonus damage is able to completely overwhelm his opponents, he's going to be better in another lane. E alone would make him all right as a toplaner.
